item.title: Samuel add a quote by -- J. Edgar Hoover
item.description: "The individual is handicapped by coming face to face with a conspiracy so monstrous he cannot believe it exists." -- -- J. Edgar Hoover

item.title: Samuel add a quote by Ayn Rand
item.description: "Volumes can be and have been written about the issue of freedom versus dictatorship, but, in essence, it comes down to a single question: do you consider it moral to treat men as sacrificial animals and to rule them by physical force?" -- Ayn Rand

item.title: Samuel add a quote by Horace Greeley
item.description: "While boasting of our noble deeds we're careful to conceal the ugly fact that by an iniquitous money system we have nationalized a system of oppression which, though more refined, is not less cruel than the old system of chattel slavery." -- Horace Greeley

item.title: Samuel add a quote by Aldous Huxley
item.description: "You shall know the truth and the truth shall make you mad." -- Aldous Huxley
